actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude certain employee productivity awards from gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income the value of an employee productivity award if the cost to the employer does not exceed certain limitations.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude certain employee productivity awards from gross income.
